PluginStrings.PluginDescription: Control your Spotify app with Macro Deck 2
PluginStrings.PauseActionDescription: Play your music, pause it or resume
PluginStrings.PreviousActionDescription: Go back to the last track
PluginStrings.ShuffleActionDescription: Toggle if music should be played in random order
PluginStrings.VolumeActionDescription: Change the volume of your Spotify player
PluginStrings.LibraryActionDescription: Add or Remove the currently playing Track to your personal Library
PluginStrings.WelcomeToSpotifyPlugin: Welcome to the Spotify plugin for Macro Deck!
PluginStrings.InThisWizardYouCreateSpotifyApp: In this wizard, you'll create a Spotify app to get the required credentials but don't worry. You'll be guided through this process.
PluginStrings.YouNeedASpotifyDevAccount: First of all, you need a Spotify developer account. This account is automatically generated when you login to the Spotify developer portal with your Spotify credentials.
PluginStrings.ContinueAfterLoggedIn: Continue with the next page after you're logged in to the Spotify developer account
PluginStrings.YouNeedAddRedirectUri: In the settings, you need to add "http://127.0.0.1:5000/callback" to the Redirect URIs.
PluginStrings.AfterPastedUriClickSave: After you pasted the uri and clicked on "Add", you can click "Save" and continue with the next page.
PluginStrings.AfterCreatedDevAccount:
After you created and logged in to the Spotify developer account, you'll be redirected to the dashboard.
Now click on "Create an App" and continue with the next page.
PluginStrings.AfterCreatedApp:
After you created the app, you'll be redirected to the app's overview.
Now click on "Edit Settings" and continue with the next page.
PluginStrings.FillInAppDetails:
Now fill in the app details as on the picture and click on "Create".
After that, continue with the next page.
PluginStrings.CopyClientIdAndPaste: Now you're on the overview page of your created app. Copy the "Client ID" and paste it in the textbox below
PluginStrings.PasteTheCopiedClientIdHere: Paste the copied Client ID here
PluginStrings.PluginConfigurationWelcomeUser: Welcome {0} Your Spotify account is now connected to Macro Deck!
PluginStrings.LoggedInFreeSpotifyAccount:
You logged-in using a free Spotify account. Due to limited access for non-premium users, you cannot control Spotify using Macro Deck. Variables are updated anyways.
Please note that this restriction comes from Spotify itself and is not caused by Macro Deck.
